scripts.linter:frontend: cd frontend/my-app && npm install && npm run linter
scripts.linter:backend: pip3 install -r requirements.txt && ruff check . --fix && black .
scripts.linter: npm run linter:frontend && npm run linter:backend
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend/my-app && npm install && npm run start
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
